document_data.name: Mount Sibasa
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Sibasa''' was the tallest among the four hills in [[Chult]] atop which [[Port Nyanzaru]] was built. It was the easternmost of the four hills, and was located in the center of the [[Port Nyanzaru/Market Ward|Market Ward]].
document_data.Description: The top of Mount Sibasa was dominated by the glittering [[Hall of Gold]], a grand temple of [[Waukeen]]. The hill's steep slopes were characterized by terraces and stepped streets. A wide stone bridge connected the top of Mount Sibasa to the top of neighboring [[Yklwazi Hill]] to the west.
